317070.name: Farming World - Jam Factory
317070.description: The Jam Factory DLC for Farming World allows you to purchase a brand new type of production facility that specialises in turning some of your harvest into jam goods. Whether you go for the quick and easy harvest of strawberries or take the time to grow an apricot tree, these new factories will let you create a brand new product which will increase your revenue considerably.
317070.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
